title: New: Sun Machine – Have You Seen It, It's Alive
body:
This is how you do a debut track.

London outfit **Sun Machine** nail the hell out of _Have You Seen It, It’s Alive_, a psych-rock masterpiece made for the live stage. Touches of 2013 success story Tame Impala as well as CitR favourites Sunboy, it’s brash, bold and, as it reaches it’s giddy peak, strangely uplifting. Check out Have You Seen It, It’s Alive below. ([via](http://www.thisisfakediy.co.uk/articles/news/listen-sun-machine-share-debut-track-have-you-seen-it-its-alive/))
